content: When you try to get your messages with the now incorrect old password doesn't it pop up a box asking for the new one?
creator: ThePillenwerfer

content: Nope, just doesn't download new messages. No error messages, no prompts, no nuttin
creator: SupportMozilla

content:
Remove the old entries from Saved Passwords in Settings/Privacy & Security, and check your settings for the outlook account:

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/microsoft-oauth-authentication-and-thunderbird-202

Then, restart TB and enter the new password in the OAuth window to allow access.
creator: sfhowes
